SEARCH
Package com.streamline.frontend.terminal.themes

Class AbstractStreamLineTheme

java.lang.Object
com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.AbstractTheme
com.streamline.frontend.terminal.themes.AbstractStreamLineTheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.Theme
Direct Known Subclasses:
DarkTheme, DefaultTheme, LightTheme, SolarizedTheme
public abstract class AbstractStreamLineTheme extends com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.AbstractTheme
StreamLineTerminalTheme is a custom theme for the StreamLine terminal application. It defines a color scheme and styles for various UI components. The theme is designed to provide a consistent and visually appealing user interface.
Author:
wellatleastitried
